document_data.name: Xeno Mirrormane
document_data.Appearance: Xeno's face was covered with wrinkles and he had curly silver-white hair. He wore long purple robes and a death's-head ring on one finger.
document_data.History:
Xeno murdered his brother [[Maskul Mirrormane]].

Xeno turned 60 in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Xeno kept a [[dirk]] in the sleeve of his robe.
